app.gui.board.grid

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.gui.board.grid.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PrimaryGrid, TrackingGrid

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base class for rendering grids. Draws squared grid of given size and legends for axis. The size of each division can also be specified. Default size of font equates to 0.3 of square size.
    Author:
    Artur Vitt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected IBoard board
      Board To be represented on the grid
